TopicTitle: How can I display the apoapsis ?

Articles.Content:
I started to play ksp one week ago and i have a lot of fun.

Today i wanted to try to get an orbit around Kerbin, and watched some tutorials and in the videos the apoapsis are marked, but I dont see them in my game. And how can I display it. I am playing in carrer mode. I know the reason now but idk How to delted a question .8i

Edited July 8, 2021 by Inki
Found a soulation
Try upgrading your tracking station. It improves the display of orbit lines, and additionally, unlocks extra data displays in one of the menus on the bottom left in flight mode.

This seems to be a bug that they haven't squashed yet. If you click the purple "orbit" tab in the lower left hand corner, it will display your Pe and Ap.

Best,

-Slashy

On 7/9/2021 at 12:14 AM, Streetwind said:

Try upgrading your tracking station. It improves the display of orbit lines, and additionally, unlocks extra data displays in one of the menus on the bottom left in flight mode.

This, along with upgrading Mission Control.  Level 2 on each will unlock all of the Ap/Pe/An/Dn markers, as well as allowing you to create maneuver nodes.
